Eligible participant randomly assign 1:1 ratio either 1 2 treatment group ( , Ustekinumab 90 mg/mL Ustekinumab 5 mg/mL ) receive treatment Day 1 . The PK comparability 2 different formulation ustekinumab , diluted saline , evaluate primarily . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
